app.name: FB Alpha 2012 CPS-1
app.author: Libretro Team & R-Sam
app.long_description:
- Emulator for CPS-1 games based on RetroArch. - Based on a snapshot of the FB Alpha codebase from 2012. - Compatible with FB Alpha v0.2.97.29 ROM sets.
Wii Channel : usb:/wad/FB Alpha 2012 CPS-1 Website : https://github.com/R-Sam-1980/cps1
